category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_apply_existing_documents_without_dataset_filter
preference.preference_description: Provide the Ability to manage an additional Warning Filter dedicated to "Hide existing documents without dataset" warning message when there is no dataset associated to the item Revision of the document. Additional filter is automatically applied when the save manager is launched if the preference is set to true (and if CATIA_save_existing_item_without_dataset is set to false).
